title: One More Night To Kill
description: Even the local bar is no safe place in the wet dark city filled with gangsters and thugs. Malone finds himself in the middle of a murderous mystery when a desperate stranger thrusts an object at him before disappearing. The private detective follows a trail of mayhem and murder in an effort to solve the mystery that was forced on him. A fast-paced action filled noir mystery in the tradition of hard-boiled detective stories.
author: Craig Austin
